jfxtras.labs.util.event

Class MouseControlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • jfxtras.labs.util.event.MouseControlUtil

  • public class MouseControlUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that provides methods for mouse gesture control. Currently, it can be used to make nodes draggable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addSelectionRectangleGesture(javafx.scene.Parent root, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rect)
      Adds a selection rectangle gesture to the specified parent node.
      static void addSelectionRectangleGesture(javafx.scene.Parent root, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rect, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> dragHandler, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> pressHandler, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> releaseHandler)
      Adds a selection rectangle gesture to the specified parent node.
      static void makeDraggable(javafx.scene.Node n)
      Makes a node draggable via mouse gesture.
      static void makeDraggable(javafx.scene.Node n, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> dragHandler, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> pressHandler)
      Makes a node draggable via mouse gesture.

    • Method Detail

      • makeDraggable

        public static void makeDraggable(javafx.scene.Node n)
        Makes a node draggable via mouse gesture.

        Note: Existing handlers will be replaced!

        Parameters:
        n - the node that shall be made draggable

      • addSelectionRectangleGesture

        public static void addSelectionRectangleGesture(javafx.scene.Parent root,
                                                javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rect)
        Adds a selection rectangle gesture to the specified parent node. A rectangle node must be specified that is used to indicate the selection area.

        Note:

        To support selection a node must implement the SelectableNode interface.
        Parameters:
        root - parent node
        rect - selectionn rectangle
        See Also:
        Clipboard, WindowUtil.getDefaultClipboard()

      • addSelectionRectangleGesture

        public static void addSelectionRectangleGesture(javafx.scene.Parent root,
                                                javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rect,
                                                javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> dragHandler,
                                                javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> pressHandler,
                                                javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> releaseHandler)
        Adds a selection rectangle gesture to the specified parent node. A rectangle node must be specified that is used to indicate the selection area.

        Note:

        To support selection a node must implement the SelectableNode interface.
        Parameters:
        root - parent node
        rect - selectionn rectangle
        dragHandler - additional drag handler (optional, may be null)
        pressHandler - additional press handler (optional, may be null)
        releaseHandler - additional release handler (optional, may be null)
        See Also:
        Clipboard, WindowUtil.getDefaultClipboard()

      • makeDraggable

        public static void makeDraggable(javafx.scene.Node n,
                                 javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> dragHandler,
                                 javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> pressHandler)
        Makes a node draggable via mouse gesture.

        Note: Existing handlers will be replaced!

        Parameters:
        n - the node that shall be made draggable
        dragHandler - additional drag handler
        pressHandler - additional press handler
